title: Did the White House Ask the Navy to Keep the USS John S. McCain ‘Out of Sight’ for Trump’s Visit?
subtitle: A flurry of news reports brought controversy in the aftermath of President Donald Trump's Memorial Day address to troops in the Pacific.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: In the spring of 2019, the White House asked U.S. naval and Air Force officials to ensure the USS John S. McCain, or its name, was not visible during U.S. President Donald Trump's 27 May speech in Japan.
